feed.title: BIP0039 Mnemonic code for generating deterministic keys

entry.title: BIP0039 Mnemonic code for generating deterministic keys
entry.summary: The email thread is about the wordlist used in python-mnemonic. Matthew Mitchell removes some words but hasn't added enough back in. Pavol Rusnak revisits the wordlist and replaces around 67 words that can be offensive in some context. The email ends with an advertisement for ServiceNow and a link to join the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
